about_the_game:
A massive box store stands at the edge of town. Sat in a car in the pouring rain, you're about to make the biggest decision, and the biggest mistake of your life. This burglary isn't something you had planned for, but so many things in and outside of your control pushed you to this. Inside, the goods and cash prove to be plentiful, but something else is here. Something else, outside of the realms logic and reason is stalking your every move and now you must evade it to avoid becoming prey. Solve puzzles to move throughout the store, gain access to its different sections, and uncover its secrets, and perhaps uncover answers to the mystery of the monster that roams this store and what ties it to this place.

Explore the store after hours where things are not what they seem

Something stalks these halls, and will hunt you, but not before playing with you

Find clues, history, and unique puzzles managed in your inventory

The beast within the store could be anywhere

Hide from the horrors that seek you out in the superstore

Game features:

  • a powerful psychological horror experience sure to stick with you far past its close

  • a deep and fleshed out story, with many secrets for you to uncover

  • multiple endings depending on the choices you make

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains aspects of psychological horror that may disturb some players. The game depicts and discusses addictive behavior.

name: Closing Time

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 3500
  • Graphics: AMD 4GB RX 570
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A first person psychological horror game with a heavy focus on a rich story with hidden secrets to uncover. Take control on the night of a burglary of a superstore. Navigate puzzles and evade and hide from the horrors as you desperately try to escape with your life.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
